fields.question: What is EcoHub?
fields.answer: EcoHub is a comprehensive platform dedicated to sustainable living and eco-friendly practices. We provide articles, tips, and resources to help you live a more environmentally conscious life.

fields.question: How do I create an account?
fields.answer: To create an account, click on the 'Register' button in the top navigation. Fill in your details including username, email, and password. You'll receive a confirmation email to verify your account.

fields.question: How can I share an article?
fields.answer: After logging in, click on 'Share Article' from the navigation or homepage. Fill in the article title, content, category, and optionally upload an image. Click 'Create Article' to publish.

fields.question: How do I share eco-friendly tips?
fields.answer: Log in to your account and click on 'Share Tip' from the navigation. Provide a title, description, and optionally attach a file. Your tip will be visible to the community once published.

fields.question: Can I edit my published content?
fields.answer: Yes, you can edit your own articles and tips. Look for the 'Edit' button on your published content. Only the author can edit their own posts to maintain content integrity.

fields.question: How do I add articles to favorites?
fields.answer: When viewing an article, click the 'Add to Favorites' button. You can view all your favorite articles by clicking on 'My Favorites' in your profile or navigation menu.

fields.question: How do I search for content?
fields.answer: Use the search bar on the homepage or visit the dedicated search page. You can search by keywords and filter by content type (articles, tips, or all content) and categories.

fields.question: What file types can I upload?
fields.answer: For article images, we support JPG, PNG, and GIF formats. For tip attachments, you can upload PDF, DOC, DOCX, and image files. Maximum file size is 5MB.

fields.question: How do I reset my password?
fields.answer: Click on 'Login' and then 'Forgot Password?' Enter your email address. You'll receive a password reset link via email. Click the link to set a new password.

fields.question: Can I delete my account?
fields.answer: Currently, account deletion is not available through the website interface. Please contact our support team if you need to delete your account and associated data.

fields.question: How do I update my profile?
fields.answer: Click on your username in the navigation to access your profile. You can update your bio, profile picture, and phone number. Click 'Save Changes' to update your profile.

fields.question: What are the article categories?
fields.answer: We have several categories including Renewable Energy, Green Lifestyle, Eco Technology, and Sustainability News. Choose the most appropriate category when publishing your article.

fields.question: How do I contact support?
fields.answer: You can contact us through the 'Contact' page. Fill out the contact form with your name, email, subject, and message. We'll respond to your inquiry within 24-48 hours.

fields.question: Is my data secure?
fields.answer: Yes, we take data security seriously. All user data is encrypted and stored securely. We never share your personal information with third parties without your consent.

fields.question: Can I comment on articles?
fields.answer: Yes, registered users can comment on articles. Simply scroll to the bottom of any article and use the comment form to share your thoughts and engage with the community.
